grendel.widgets
Class TreeTableModelEvent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.util.EventObject
        |
        +--grendel.widgets.TreeTableModelEvent
public class TreeTableModelEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

A TreeTableDataModel event. Used for reporting which node and possibly which child nodes were involved in an event.

See Also:
TreeTableDataModel, TreeTableModelListener, Serialized Form
